accounts.name: maker
docs: Maker (order creator) who wants to cancel

accounts.name: creator_usdc_account
docs: Creator's USDC account (for paying creation fee)

instructions.name: deposit_usdc
docs: Deposit USDC into the market vault for trading
Creates UserBalance and UserPosition accounts if needed

instructions.name: distribute_liquidity_reward
docs: Distribute liquidity reward to a recipient (admin only)

accounts.name: operator
docs: Operator executing the fill (must be in global.operators)

accounts.name: order_status
docs: Order status PDA - tracks fill state

instructions.name: increment_nonce
docs: Increment user nonce to batch-cancel all orders with lower nonce

accounts.name: user
docs: User who wants to increment their nonce

accounts.name: creator_treasury
docs: Owned by global PDA, stores creator incentive pool

instructions.name: init_market_vault
docs: Initialize market USDC vault (should be called after market creation)

accounts.name: usdc_mint
docs: USDC mint account - validated in handler

instructions.name: init_platform_treasury
docs: Initialize the platform treasury for collecting trading and creation fees

accounts.name: platform_treasury
docs: Owned by global PDA, stores all platform fees

accounts.name: reward_treasury
docs: Owned by global PDA, stores liquidity rewards pool

instructions.name: match_orders
docs: Match taker order against multiple maker orders atomically
Supports COMPLEMENTARY, MINT, and MERGE match types

instructions.name: merge_position_single
docs: Merge YES and NO positions back to USDC for a SINGLE question
Merge 1 YES + 1 NO position back into 1 USDC

accounts.name: global
docs: Global state account (contains USDC mint reference)

instructions.name: pause_market
docs: Pause a market (admin only - emergency stop)

instructions.name: redeem_single_outcome
docs: Redeem single outcome position after settlement or termination

accounts.name: user_usdc_account
docs: User's USDC account to receive redemption

instructions.name: request_randomness
docs: Request Switchboard randomness for market settlement check

accounts.name: payer
docs: User requesting validation (no fees charged for this instruction)

instructions.name: set_keeper
docs: Set or update the keeper wallet address.

instructions.name: settle_market
docs: Settle the market based on last trade outcome

instructions.name: settle_with_randomness
docs: Check and settle market using Switchboard randomness
Implements random termination mechanism from the paper

instructions.name: split_position_single
docs: Split USDC into YES and NO positions for a SINGLE question
Split 1 USDC into 1 YES + 1 NO position

accounts.name: global
docs: Global state account (contains USDC mint reference)

instructions.name: terminate_if_inactive
docs: Terminate a market if it has been inactive for >= 7 days.
Note: Batch termination is handled at the backend level by bundling
multiple terminateIfInactive instructions into a single transaction.

accounts.name: caller
docs: Keeper or authority (either can call this instruction)

instructions.name: update_fee_rates
docs: Adjusts the dynamic fee curve parameters

accounts.name: global
docs: Global state - now stores all fee configuration

instructions.name: update_market_params
docs: Update market termination probability and maker rebate rate (admin only)

instructions.name: withdraw_platform_fees
docs: Transfers accumulated fees from platform treasury

accounts.name: recipient_usdc_account
docs: Recipient USDC account (where fees will be sent)

accounts.name: recipient_usdc_account
docs: Recipient USDC account (where rewards will be sent)

instructions.name: withdraw_usdc
docs: Withdraw USDC from the market vault
Returns USDC to user's token account

errors.name: InvalidProbability
errors.msg: Invalid probability: must be between 0 and 1

errors.name: OrderNotFillable
errors.msg: Order not fillable (already filled or cancelled)

errors.name: InvalidTaker
errors.msg: Invalid taker (order restricted to specific taker)

types.name: DistributeLiquidityRewardParams
docs: Distribute liquidity reward to a recipient (admin only)

fields.name: keeper
docs: Keeper wallet for automated tasks (terminating inactive markets)
Can be set to a different wallet than authority for separation of concerns
If set to Pubkey::default(), only authority can perform keeper tasks

fields.name: center_taker_fee_rate
docs: Center taker fee rate at 50% price (scaled by 10^6, e.g., 32000 = 3.2%)
This is the MAXIMUM fee rate at 50-50 odds

fields.name: extreme_taker_fee_rate
docs: Extreme taker fee rate at 0%/100% price (scaled by 10^6, e.g., 2000 = 0.2%)
This is the MINIMUM fee rate, encouraging arbitrage and high-frequency trading

fields.name: platform_fee_rate
docs: Portion of taker fees sent to platform treasury

fields.name: maker_rebate_rate
docs: Portion of taker fees sent to rewards treasury (for liquidity providers)

fields.name: creator_incentive_rate
docs: Portion of taker fees sent to market creator

fields.name: trading_paused
docs: When true, no trading operations (fill_order, match_orders) are allowed

fields.name: operators
docs: List of operator addresses (authorized to execute trades)
Operators can call fill_order and match_orders

types.name: GlobalFeeRatesUpdated
docs: Emitted when admin updates platform-wide fee configuration.
All markets read from Global account, so changes take effect immediately.

fields.name: keeper
docs: Optional keeper wallet for automated tasks. If None, defaults to authority.

fields.name: last_activity_ts
docs: Updated on each order/swap; used for inactivity-based termination.

fields.name: status
docs: 0: Active - market is active and trading
1: Settled - market has been settled (outcome determined)
4: Terminated - market terminated due to inactivity (7 days)

fields.name: randomness_account
docs: Fixed Switchboard randomness account for this market

fields.name: total_position_collateral
docs: Total USDC collateral backing YES/NO positions

fields.name: total_yes_supply
docs: Total YES supply (1 YES minted per 1 USDC split)

fields.name: total_no_supply
docs: Total NO supply (1 NO minted per 1 USDC split)

fields.name: total_redeemable_usdc
docs: Total redeemable USDC locked at settlement/termination

fields.name: last_trade_slot
docs: Last observed trade/order slot (best-effort; may be None for brand-new markets)

fields.name: random_termination_enabled
docs: Whether random termination is enabled (enabled by default)

fields.name: termination_probability
docs: Termination probability per trade (scaled by 10^6, e.g., 1000 = 0.1%)

fields.name: is_randomly_terminated
docs: Whether market has been randomly terminated

fields.name: final_yes_price
docs: Final YES price when terminated (scaled by 10^6)

fields.name: final_no_price
docs: Final NO price when terminated (scaled by 10^6)

fields.name: trade_nonce
docs: Trade nonce - incremented on each trade that opts for VRF check
Used to ensure unique randomness: hash(vrf_value, market, user, nonce, slot)

fields.name: creator_incentive_accrued
docs: Tracks 5% of taker fees allocated to market creator

fields.name: is_paused
docs: Whether market is paused by admin (emergency stop)

types.name: MarketCreationFeeCollected
docs: Triggered when creator creates a new market

types.name: MarketParamsUpdated
docs: Note: Fee rates are now managed globally via GlobalFeeRatesUpdated event.
This event only tracks per-market parameters like termination probability.

fields.name: taker_fill_amount
docs: Fill amount for taker order (in maker_amount units)

fields.name: maker_fill_amounts
docs: Fill amounts for each maker order

types.name: MergePositionSingleParams
docs: Merge YES and NO positions back to USDC for binary market
User must hold equal amounts of both YES and NO positions

types.name: NonceIncremented
docs: Emitted when a user increments their nonce to cancel all pending orders

types.name: Order
docs: Matches Polymarket CTF Exchange order format

fields.name: salt
docs: Unique entropy value (prevents hash collision for identical params)

fields.name: signer
docs: Signature signer (can differ from maker for proxy wallets)

fields.name: nonce
docs: User nonce (for batch cancellation via increment_nonce)

types.name: OrderCancelled
docs: Emitted when an order is cancelled by the maker

types.name: OrderFilled
docs: Emitted when an order is partially or fully filled

fields.name: maker_asset_id
docs: Maker asset ID (token_id of asset maker provides)

fields.name: taker_asset_id
docs: Taker asset ID (token_id of asset taker provides)

types.name: OrderStatus
docs: Order status tracking for partial fills
Each order has a corresponding OrderStatus PDA that tracks:
- Whether the order is filled or cancelled
- Remaining amount that can still be filled
This enables partial fills where an order can be matched multiple times

fields.name: is_filled_or_cancelled
docs: Whether the order is fully filled or cancelled

fields.name: remaining
docs: Remaining maker amount that can still be filled
Initialized to order.maker_amount on first fill

types.name: OrdersMatched
docs: Emitted when a taker order is matched against one or more maker orders

fields.name: token_amount
docs: Amount of outcome positions to redeem

fields.name: new_keeper
docs: New keeper address. Set to Pubkey::default() to disable separate keeper.

fields.name: user_opted_termination_check
docs: Whether user opted to check termination (and paid VRF fee)

types.name: SplitPositionSingleParams
docs: Split USDC into YES and NO positions for binary market
User deposits USDC and receives equal amounts of YES and NO positions

types.name: TerminationCheckResult
docs: Emitted EVERY time a user attempts VRF termination check.
Frontend should parse this event to determine if termination was triggered.
- `was_terminated`: true if market was terminated, false if continues trading
- `random_value`: the derived unique random value (for verification)

fields.name: trade_nonce
docs: Trade nonce at the time of check (ensures uniqueness)

fields.name: random_value
docs: The derived unique random value (0 to 100_000_000)

types.name: TradingFeeCollected
docs: Triggered when a trade is settled on-chain
Records trading fee based on dynamic fee curve
AUDIT FIX v1.2.5: Added maker, taker, outcome_type, side, size fields
for complete trade event tracking needed by off-chain sync

fields.name: user
docs: User who paid the trading fee (usually taker)

types.name: UpdateFeeRatesParams
docs: Allows admin to adjust the platform-wide fee configuration:
All markets read from the Global account, so changes take effect immediately.
- Fee rates must be between 0 and 10% (0-100,000 scaled by 10^6)
- platform + maker + creator rates must equal 100% (1,000,000)

fields.name: center_taker_fee_rate
docs: New center fee rate (at 50% probability, scaled by 10^6)

fields.name: extreme_taker_fee_rate
docs: New extreme fee rate (at 0%/100% probability, scaled by 10^6)

types.name: UpdateMarketParamsInput
docs: Allows admin to adjust per-market settings:
Note: Fee rates (platform/maker/creator) are now managed globally via update_fee_rates.

types.name: UserNonce
docs: User nonce account for order cancellation
- Each user has a single nonce value
- Orders with nonce < current_nonce are considered cancelled
- User can increment nonce to cancel all pending orders at once
- Individual orders can also be cancelled via cancel_order instruction

fields.name: current_nonce
docs: Orders with nonce < this value are automatically invalid/cancelled

types.name: WithdrawPlatformFeesParams
docs: Allows admin to withdraw accumulated trading fees and market creation fees
from the platform treasury to a specified recipient address.
- Only program authority can call this
- Transfers USDC from platform treasury to recipient

types.name: WithdrawRewardFeesParams
docs: Allows admin to transfer USDC from the reward treasury to a recipient.
